headline: Will Arm’s Deepened Nvidia Partnership Shift the Competitive Balance in AI Data Centers for ARM?
summary: In November 2025, Arm Holdings and Nvidia announced an expanded partnership integrating NVLink Fusion technology into Arm's Neoverse platform to enhance AI data center infrastructure efficiency and performance for cloud providers. This collaboration aims to accelerate the adoption of specialized AI infrastructure and is supported by Arm’s widespread deployment among leading hyperscalers such as Amazon, Microsoft, Oracle, Google, and Meta Platforms. The partnership underscores Arm's intent to...

headline: AI rivals like OpenAI, Nvidia, and Oracle are collaborating to build ‘Stargate’—but a Yale expert says it violates 135 years of antitrust law

headline: Nvidia Didn’t Save the Market. What’s Next for the AI Trade?
summary: In addition, the circular nature of these financing arrangements creates a potential systemic risk in which one company’s weakness can bring down the entire trade.  To them, the mega-cap technology firms at the heart of the AI trade — Microsoft Corp., Amazon.com Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc. — are going to keep spending to develop their offerings, with no signs of slowing anytime soon.

content.title: Nvidia Didn’t Save the Market. What’s Next for the AI Trade?
content.summary: In addition, the circular nature of these financing arrangements creates a potential systemic risk in which one company’s weakness can bring down the entire trade.  To them, the mega-cap technology firms at the heart of the AI trade — Microsoft Corp., Amazon.com Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc. — are going to keep spending to develop their offerings, with no signs of slowing anytime soon.
